name: Gino il Pollo - Perso Nella Rete
summary: "Gino il Pollo - Perso Nella Rete" is an adventure video game that follows the escapades of Gino, the renowned singing chicken of the internet. In this captivating journey, Gino is kidnapped by the enigmatic character Colby and faces the dire threat of being forever trapped within the depths of the Internet. The success of Colby's experiment would lead to the same fate for humanity.
